ResticRepositoryPath.description: Filesystem or remote path to the Restic repository.

ResticPassword.description: Password used to encrypt the Restic repository (must not be empty, 20+ length).

ResticBackupOptions.description: List of additional command-line options for the Restic backup command.

ResticForgetOptions.description: List of command-line options for the Restic forget command (retention policy).

BackupSuccessCommand.description: Optional command executed after a successful backup.
